modName: Dome of The Rock- Medium Sized Starter Playerhome
summary: A medium sized Underground Player Home located in the Lake Illinalta with every necessary amenities and labelled storage containers.
descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION------------------

A Dwemer Style medium sized Underground Starter Player Home located in the Lake Illinalta 
with every necessary amenities and labelled storage containers. Fully Navmeshed and ready for companions (except the secret temple), full crafting and storage.

The House has been decorated with mostly static objects with very little to no havok objects at all. If you actually enjoy \"kicking the food off the table...\" then this is probably not the mod for you.

The House is located right off the path towards falkreath in the lake illinalta (Location in Screenshots). The Location makes it a good starter home.

I tried to employ the \"just in time lighting\" scripts to the fullest potential but its very nature and the way it works leaves behind some snags here and there in a open hall type house mod like this. Especially in the Main hall. If it breaks the immersion for you then i am truly sorry.

INSTALLATION-----------------

Manual Installation - Download the archive, Unpack it and Copy the Data Folder, Paste it into your SKYRIM folder.
Activate \"Dome of The Rock.esp\" from Skyrim config data files section or using your preferred mod manager.

REQUIREMENTS-----------------

Skyrim Patch 1.9.32.0.8. Required
No Dlc\'s Necessary
The Modder\'s Resources were packed with this mod

UNINSTALLATION----------------

Deactivate and/or Remove \"Dome of The Rock.esp\" from Skyrim config data files section or using your preferred mod manager.
Or remove it physically from the Skyrim\\Data Folder.

FEATURES----------------

bed <well rested>
alchemy st
enchanting st
Library
cooking pot
Anvil
Tanning rack
Workbench
Grindstone
Smelter
Blessing Altars 9 Divines
Mannequins
Display Boxes
Plaques
Racks 
Dragon Priest Masks (Hidden)

CONTAINERS---------------

Weapons 1 Hand
Weapons 1 Hand Magical
Weapons 2 Hand
Weapons 2 Hand Magical
Weapons Bows
Weapons Bows Magical
Weapons Arrows
Daedric Artifacts
Dragon Claws
Clothes
Necklaces
Necklaces Magical
Rings
Rings Magical
Keys
Robes and Hoods
Robes and Hoods Magical
Armor Light
Armor Light Magical
Armor Heavy
Armor Heavy Magical
Shields 
Shields Magical
Books 
SpellBooks 
Scrolls   
Magic Staffs  
Journals letters and stuff 
Food
Alchemical Ingredients(Cooking) 
Beverages
Potions  
Created Potions
Poisons
Created Poisons
Alchemical Ingredients(Alchemy) 
My Enchanted Items  
Soulgems   
Miscellaneous Items  
Gemstones and Precious items
Ores 
Ingots
Leather and Strips 
Pelts and Hides 
Special Resources 
Alchemical Ingredients(Smithing)

CREDITS------------

First things First !! I would like to specifically Thank \"Eldiabs and Team\" for Inspiring me through the \"Deus Mons\" mod and also thank you for directing me to Daemonjax\'s \"Just in Time Lighting Scripts\". You Guys Rightfully deserve all those endorsements.

Then I would like to thank all those guys who created all the third party content i have used in this mod. Thank you for allowing us to use your resources without permission.

Blary - Blary\'s Resources   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2250922/?tb=mods&pUp=1
Oaristys and Tony67 - Modders Resource Pack  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16525//?
Daemonjax - Just in Time Lighting Scripts  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10361//?
Sydzilla - Markarth City Banner Re-texture   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18732//?

Lastly....

Bethesda - Thanks for a great game.
Nexus site/staff - Thanks for making a great place to share our creativity.


Credit where its due !!!

KNOWN ISSUES----------------

As of Yet None in terms of Fatal Game-Breaking Bugs.


NOTES--------------

1. The Lighting of this mod was not created with any other lighting add-on in mind.
   How you want to play your game is your own business. But let me warn you that add-ons like,
   for example RLO might make the interior lighting over-bright and really bad. 
   At least it doesn\'t suit my tastes.....A good suggestion maybe is to turn off the RLO - Dungeons plugin.

2. I am not a regular modder. 
   Neither modding nor playing games is something i do every day 
   nor do i get enough time to visit/revisit this site. 
   I tried my level best to make this mod as perfect as possible at one go simply because 
   I really don\'t think I will be able to keep track of bugs appearing 
   or requests to add more to the mod. 
   Keep this things in mind and always read descriptions properly before using any game/mod/tool/anything. It saves a lot of time !!!
author: Nocturnal Fox
